Super Block Boy & Friends is an exhilarating 2D precision platformer that puts your skills and sanity to the ultimate test. Dive into our world of challenging levels that reward grit and persistence. The game is available now for early access on itch.io. It's fully playable and we're on the lookout for dedicated platform enthusiasts to join us in refining this adventure.

We need your help! Jump into our Discord community to report bugs and provide invaluable feedback. The goal of this early access is to improve the game before its full release on Steam in 2025. Join us on this thrilling journey and be a part of shaping the future of our game!

Features

  • Narrative driven puzzle/precision platformer
  • Over 100 levels to challenge your mind and reflexes
  • Tons of secrets, hidden pickups and easter eggs
  • Hundreds of Outfits, Hats and Pets to customize your look
  • A plethora of friendly (and not so friendly) NPCs
  • A multitude of special abilities and powers
  • Challenge rooms to test your skill and sanity
  • Pixel art brought to life at 60fps
  • Dozens of enemy variations
  • Several mini games including fishing and slot machines
  • Over 40 unlockable achievements
  • Game stat tracking across 3 save slots
  • Xbox and PlayStation Gamepad support
  • Customizable controls
  • Retro soundtrack spanning 20 songs
  • Unlockable Speedrun and Hardcore modes
  • In game photo taking and viewing
